items.how: AND Searches for two terms and hence narrows the search. When you use AND - It will retrieve results that have both words.
items.alt: Venn diagram of obesity AND exercise

items.how: OR Searches for two or more terms and hence expands the search. When you use OR - It will retrieve results that have either word. It is useful for capturing synonymous.
items.alt: Venn diagram of Hostpital OR Healthcare

items.how: NOT Excludes a term or terms from search and hence narrows the search. When you use NOT - it will only retrieve result of primary term (s).
items.alt: venn diagram of Practitioners NOT Doctors
